title: Iran Sanctions, Tariffs, Gun Control Debate
itunes:title: Iran Sanctions, Tariffs, Gun Control Debate
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Kristen Hawn, Democratic Strategist, Senior Advisor at Rokk Solutions and Fmr. Blue Dog Coalition Communications Director and Brendan Buck, Former Spokesman & Advisor to House Speaker Paul Ryan and Partner at Seven Letter.

To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
